title: Steel Cut Oats Summer Grain Salad

instructions:
In a pan, on medium-high heat, add oil and begin to sauté the onions and zucchini.
Stir and sauté for 2 minutes, then add baby lime beans and garlic and sauté for another 2 minutes, stirring to prevent garlic from burning.
Once the garlic is aromatic, add bell peppers and corn, lowering to medium-low heat, stirring, and tossing the veggies.
Add the white wine vinegar and salt, creating a light sauce that will be used to flavor the oats.
Lower the heat to low, add the fluffy oats, and fold and stir vegetables until well incorporated together.
Serve and enjoy!

Toss and stir the oats for 5 minutes, assuring they don't stand still too long to prevent them from burning. You are looking for a nutty and toasty smell.
Pour toasty oats into the bowl, add salt, and carefully add hot/boiling water from the water kettle into the bowl. The Oats will boil up with force but quickly settle down, be careful.
Cover with foil and let stand for 25 min.
When ready, uncover and fluff with a fork or spatula and use as a rice replacer or other unique ways.
Can be made ahead and stored refrigerated for 3 days.
